testcase.name: Check that item details shows the right values

failure.message: The scenario has pending or undefined step(s)

testcase.failure: Given The user open the Work Items..........................................undefined And Choose a random item and save the data of random item...................skipped When Click symbol search....................................................skipped Then Work Item details appear...............................................skipped And The url contain the the WIID of the seleced random item.................skipped And Under Work Item Details section shows the right data (WIID_Type_Status_Date) of selected random item.skipped When User click on button Update Work Item..................................skipped Then A new windows pop Up...................................................skipped Given The User change the status of the item to rejected....................skipped When The user click on Update Work Item.....................................skipped Then Then an alert with following appears "Please fill in the complete update form!".skipped Given The user add comment and click again on Update Work Item..............skipped Then Then an alert with following appears "Work Item was updated accordingly".skipped Given The user navigate back to work item table and check the status of random selected item.skipped Then The item status is changed to "Rejected"...............................skipped
